name: SpeciesConstructing
description:
Project for Shenanijam 2019.

Game idea: player should setup Fagocite cells at the battle beginning and then get the result with randomness (result is a body part of new creature; randomness  should depends of health points that lasts in virus) depending on setup optimality. 

Fagocite cells deals damage to virus.

After passing 4 levels (for 4 body types: head, chest, legs, hands) connected result must be shown.

Actually, at that moment, fagocites setup isn't working, fagocites don't deal damage and result generating don't depends on any battle data, just shows one of two frog pictures.
